name: The Arc of the South Shore, INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Arc of the South Shore, INC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Hingham, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.3M in Medicaid payments across 82K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
